entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 7:33 PM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
